.b-split-clone .b-grid-subgrid.title: Split view
.b-split-clone .b-grid-subgrid.content: The scheduler to the left is the original grid, while this is a scroll synced clone of it

.b-buttongroup.title: Split the scheduler
.b-buttongroup.content: Use these buttons to split the scheduler into multiple views, or right click in a cell / at a date and use the context menu to split there
